name: Space Attack! (kaelfdl)
description:
Game Modifications:

  1. Added Boost Pickup to increase fire rate and player movement speed.
  2. Added Enemy Spawner Behavior to spawn more enemy spawners after eliminating a number of enemies.
  3. Added additional difficulty by increasing enemy speed gradually.
  4. Added Player behavior by increasing speed and fire rate gradually per enemy kill.
  5. Added a life counter.
  6. Modified UI color and background.

Credits:

Created by Kael Flor de Lis
